verses.verse: Also, you son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> prophesy <WH5012> to the mountains <WH2022> of Israel, <WH3478> and say, <WH559> You mountains <WH2022> of Israel, <WH3478> hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of the LORD: <WH3068>

Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Because <WH3282> the enemy <WH341> has said <WH559> against <WH5921> you, Aha, <WH253> even the ancient <WH5769> high <WH1116> places are ours in possession: <WH4181>

Therefore <WH3651> prophesy <WH5012> and say, <WH559> Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Because <WH3282> they have made you desolate, <WH8074> and swallowed <WH7602> you up on every <WH5437> side, <WH5439> that you might be a possession <WH4181> to the residue <WH7611> of the heathen, <WH1471> and you are taken <WH5927> up in the lips <WH8193> of talkers, <WH3956> and are an infamy <WH1681> of the people: <WH5971>

Therefore, <WH3651> you mountains <WH2022> of Israel, <WH3478> hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069> to the mountains, <WH2022> and to the hills, <WH1389> to the rivers, <WH650> and to the valleys, <WH1516> to the desolate <WH8076> wastes, <WH2723> and to the cities <WH5892> that are forsaken, <WH5800> which <WH834> became <WH1961> a prey <WH957> and derision <WH3932> to the residue <WH7611> of the heathen <WH1471> that are round <WH5439> about;

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Surely <WH518> <WH3808> in the fire <WH784> of my jealousy <WH7068> have I spoken <WH1696> against <WH5921> the residue <WH7611> of the heathen, <WH1471> and against <WH5921> all <WH3605> Idumea, <WH123> which <WH834> have appointed <WH5414> my land <WH776> into their possession <WH4181> with the joy <WH8057> of all <WH3605> their heart, <WH3824> with despiteful <WH7589> minds, <WH5315> to cast <WH4054> it out for a prey. <WH957>

Prophesy <WH5012> therefore <WH3651> concerning <WH5921> the land <WH127> of Israel, <WH3478> and say <WH559> to the mountains, <WH2022> and to the hills, <WH1389> to the rivers, <WH650> and to the valleys, <WH1516> Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Behold, <WH2005> I have spoken <WH1696> in my jealousy <WH7068> and in my fury, <WH2534> because <WH3282> you have borne <WH5375> the shame <WH3639> of the heathen: <WH1471>

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> I have lifted <WH5375> up my hand, <WH3027> Surely <WH518> <WH3808> the heathen <WH1471> that are about <WH5439> you, they shall bear <WH5375> their shame. <WH3639>

But you, O mountains <WH2022> of Israel, <WH3478> you shall shoot <WH5414> forth your branches, <WH6057> and yield <WH5375> your fruit <WH6529> to my people <WH5971> of Israel; <WH3478> for they are at <WH7126> hand <WH7126> to come. <WH935>
For, behold, <WH2005> I am for you, and I will turn <WH6437> to you, and you shall be tilled <WH5647> and sown: <WH2232>

And I will multiply <WH7235> men <WH120> on you, all <WH3605> the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> even all <WH3605> of it: and the cities <WH5892> shall be inhabited, <WH3427> and the wastes <WH2723> shall be built: <WH1129>

And I will multiply <WH7235> on you man <WH120> and beast; <WH929> and they shall increase <WH7235> and bring <WH6509> fruit: <WH6509> and I will settle <WH3427> you after your old <WH6927> estates, and will do better <WH2896> to you than at your beginnings: <WH7221> and you shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD. <WH3068>

Yes, I will cause men <WH120> to walk <WH3212> on you, even <WH853> my people <WH5971> Israel; <WH3478> and they shall possess <WH3423> you, and you shall be their inheritance, <WH5159> and you shall no <WH3808> more <WH5750> from now on bereave <WH7921> them of men.
Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Because <WH3282> they say <WH559> to you, You land devour <WH398> up men, <WH120> and have bereaved <WH7921> your nations: <WH1471>

Therefore <WH3651> you shall devour <WH398> men <WH120> no <WH3808> more, <WH5750> neither <WH3808> bereave <WH3782> <WH7921> your nations <WH1471> any more, <WH5750> said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>

Neither <WH3808> will I cause men to hear <WH8085> in you the shame <WH3639> of the heathen <WH1471> any more, <WH5750> neither <WH3808> shall you bear <WH5375> the reproach <WH2781> of the people <WH5971> any more, <WH5750> neither <WH3808> shall you cause your nations <WH1471> to fall <WH3782> any more, <WH5750> said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>
Moreover the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> to me, saying, <WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> when the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> dwelled <WH3427> in their own land, <WH127> they defiled <WH2930> it by their own way <WH1870> and by their doings: <WH5949> their way <WH1870> was before <WH6440> me as the uncleanness <WH2932> of a removed <WH5079> woman.
Why I poured <WH8210> my fury <WH2534> on them for the blood <WH1818> that they had shed <WH8210> on the land, <WH776> and for their idols <WH1544> with which they had polluted <WH2930> it:

And I scattered <WH6327> them among the heathen, <WH1471> and they were dispersed <WH2219> through the countries: <WH776> according to their way <WH1870> and according to their doings <WH5949> I judged <WH8199> them.

And when they entered <WH935> to the heathen, <WH1471> where <WH834> <WH8033> they went, <WH935> they profaned <WH2490> my holy <WH6944> name, <WH8034> when they said <WH559> to them, These <WH428> are the people <WH5971> of the LORD, <WH3068> and are gone <WH3318> forth <WH3318> out of his land. <WH776>

But I had pity <WH2550> for my holy <WH6944> name, <WH8034> which <WH834> the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> had profaned <WH2490> among the heathen, <WH1471> where <WH834> <WH8033> they went. <WH935>

Therefore <WH3651> say <WH559> to the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> I do <WH6213> not this for your sakes, <WH4616> O house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> but for my holy <WH6944> name's <WH8034> sake, which <WH834> you have profaned <WH2490> among the heathen, <WH1471> where <WH834> <WH8033> you went. <WH935>

And I will sanctify <WH6942> my great <WH1419> name, <WH8034> which was profaned <WH2490> among the heathen, <WH1471> which <WH834> you have profaned <WH2490> in the middle <WH8432> of them; and the heathen <WH1471> shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD, <WH3068> said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> when I shall be sanctified <WH6942> in you before their eyes. <WH5869>
For I will take <WH3947> you from among the heathen, <WH1471> and gather <WH6908> you out of all <WH3605> countries, <WH776> and will bring <WH935> you into <WH413> your own land. <WH127>

Then will I sprinkle <WH2236> clean <WH2889> water <WH4325> on you, and you shall be clean: <WH2891> from all <WH3605> your filthiness, <WH2932> and from all <WH3605> your idols, <WH1544> will I cleanse <WH2891> you.

A new <WH2319> heart <WH3820> also will I give <WH5414> you, and a new <WH2319> spirit <WH7307> will I put <WH5414> within <WH7130> you: and I will take <WH5493> away <WH5493> the stony <WH68> heart <WH3820> out of your flesh, <WH1320> and I will give <WH5414> you an heart <WH3820> of flesh. <WH1320>
And I will put <WH5414> my spirit <WH7307> within <WH7130> you, and cause you to walk <WH3212> in my statutes, <WH2706> and you shall keep <WH8104> my judgments, <WH4941> and do <WH6213> them.
And you shall dwell <WH3427> in the land <WH776> that I gave <WH5414> to your fathers; <WH1> and you shall be my people, <WH5971> and I will be your God. <WH430>

I will also save <WH3467> you from all <WH3605> your uncleannesses: <WH2932> and I will call <WH7121> for the corn, <WH1715> and will increase <WH7235> it, and lay <WH5414> no <WH3808> famine <WH7458> on you.

And I will multiply <WH7235> the fruit <WH6529> of the tree, <WH6086> and the increase <WH8570> of the field, <WH7704> that you shall receive <WH3947> no <WH3808> more <WH5750> reproach <WH2781> of famine <WH7458> among the heathen. <WH1471>

Then shall you remember <WH2142> your own evil <WH7451> ways, <WH1870> and your doings <WH4611> that were not good, <WH2896> and shall loathe <WH6962> yourselves in your own sight <WH6440> for your iniquities <WH5771> and for your abominations. <WH8441>

Not for your sakes <WH4616> do <WH6213> I this, said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> be it known <WH3045> to you: be ashamed <WH954> and confounded <WH3637> for your own ways, <WH1870> O house <WH1004> of Israel. <WH3478>

Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> In the day <WH3117> that I shall have cleansed <WH2891> you from all <WH3605> your iniquities <WH5771> I will also cause you to dwell <WH3427> in the cities, <WH5892> and the wastes <WH2723> shall be built. <WH1129>
And the desolate <WH8074> land <WH776> shall be tilled, <WH5647> whereas <WH8478> <WH834> it lay desolate <WH8077> in the sight <WH5869> of all <WH3605> that passed <WH5674> by.

And they shall say, <WH559> This <WH1977> land <WH776> that was desolate <WH8074> is become like the garden <WH1588> of Eden; <WH5731> and the waste <WH2720> and desolate <WH8074> and ruined <WH2040> cities <WH5892> are become fenced, <WH1219> and are inhabited. <WH3427>

Then the heathen <WH1471> that are left <WH7604> round <WH5439> about you shall know <WH3045> that I the LORD <WH3068> build <WH1129> the ruined <WH2040> places, and plant <WH5193> that that was desolate: <WH8074> I the LORD <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> it, and I will do <WH6213> it.

Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> I will yet <WH5750> for this <WH2063> be inquired <WH1875> of by the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> to do <WH6213> it for them; I will increase <WH7235> them with men <WH120> like a flock. <WH6629>

As the holy <WH6944> flock, <WH6629> as the flock <WH6629> of Jerusalem <WH3389> in her solemn <WH4150> feasts; <WH4150> so <WH3651> shall the waste <WH2720> cities <WH5892> be filled <WH4390> with flocks <WH6629> of men: <WH120> and they shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD. <WH3068>
